name: en-usb
title: Insert a USB Stick/Drive to Publish Files Here
description: Teachers/Librarians: your class handouts (PDF files, photos, videos, etc) will instantly appear RIGHT HERE after you insert a USB stick/drive into the Internet-in-a-Box. Students can upload their work by clicking on button Upload to USB.
extra_description: Any teacher can optionally create a folder named PUBLIC on their USB stick, if student uploads need to be private.
